meta.description: RAG base: general information for the restaurant voice assistant.

location.address: 12 Rue de la République, 75001 Paris, France
location.directions_brief: Metro line 1, République station a 3-minute walk.

parking.street_parking: Limited blue zone street parking, check with the city hall

opening_hours.notes: Kitchen open until 22:00 on weekdays, 22:30 on weekends.

reservation_policy.how_to_reserve: Reserve by phone, website or via the voice assistant.
reservation_policy.deposit: No deposit required for standard reservations. Deposit may be required for groups > 8 people.
reservation_policy.cancellation: Cancellations accepted up to 24 hours before the reservation free of charge.
reservation_policy.no_show_policy: No penalty for no-shows, but please notify us if possible.
reservation_policy.advance_notice: Reservations recommended on weekends, accepted up to 2 months in advance

faqs.question: Do you accept pets?
faqs.answer: Small dogs are allowed on the terrace. Pets are not allowed inside.

faqs.question: Do you offer children's menus?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a children's menu (smaller portion) priced at €7.50.

faqs.question: Do you offer gluten-free dishes?
faqs.answer: We offer gluten-free options; please report any allergies when ordering.

faqs.question: Can I reserve for a birthday or special event?
faqs.answer: Yes, contact us at +33 1 23 45 67 89 to organize a private event.

faqs.question: Do you offer vegetarian or vegan menus?
faqs.answer: We have several vegetarian options. Vegan dishes are available on request.

faqs.question: Do you have a terrace?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a 40-seat terrace. Reservation recommended during high season.

special_offers.title: Happy Hour
special_offers.description: Cocktails 30% off every day from 17:00 to 19:00.

special_offers.title: Loyalty Program
special_offers.description: Every 10th visit: complimentary aperitif or 10% off the bill.

allergies_handling.policy: Report any allergy when ordering. Our chefs can adapt dishes.

communication_guidelines.greeting: Welcome! You have reached Restaurant Exemple. How can I help you?
communication_guidelines.closing: Thank you for calling! See you soon at the restaurant.
communication_guidelines.when_busy: We are currently busy. Please call back in a few minutes.

metadata_for_rag.notes: Reduced file containing only general information (menu managed separately).
